Town Center.notes: Gate for most progress checks (troops, research, buildings).

Embassy.unlock: Required before Town Center upgrade beyond Level 9
effects: Increases Ally Assists (number of helps you can receive)
Increases Ally Help Time (seconds reduced per help)
Increases Reinforce Capacity (max troops you can receive)
Embassy.notes: Issues/responds to Alliance Help and reinforcement requests.

Academy.notes: Research institute; unlocks tech that boosts city growth, economy, and battle capabilities.
